function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of waste management strategies in BREEAM guidance","Impact":"Increased risk of waste accumulation and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate waste management strategies into building guidelines, adopt recycling and waste reduction practices","Technologies":"Waste processing technologies, recycling facilities","People":"Community members, building occupants, waste management personnel","Owner":"Building developers, waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Unaddressed personal comfort requirements in BREEAM guidance","Impact":"Potential negative impact on occupant well-being and mental health, increased risk of stress-related health issues","Mitigation":"Include personal space and noise pollution standards in building design, prioritize occupant comfort and well-being","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, space management design, ergonomic furnishings","People":"Occupants, building designers, architects","Owner":"Building developers, design professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on self-dependent local services in BREEAM guidance","Impact":"Vulnerability to disruptions in local service supply, potential impact on community health and well-being during pandemics","Mitigation":"Promote self-dependent local services, encourage the cultivation of fresh food within the community, prioritize access to essential services","Technologies":"Urban agriculture, sustainable local service infrastructure, community engagement platforms","People":"Community members, local service providers, urban planners","Owner":"Local governments, community leaders, urban planners"}]}
